page.title: 09STRETTON FIRST SCHOOL.
page.content: IN{STRETTON ON DUNSMORE}THERE IS A {FIRST SCHOOL}WHICH STANDS IN THE SAME GROUNDS AS THE MIDDLE SCHOOL. THE FIRST SCHOOL USED TO BE AN INFANTS SCHOOL AND THE HEADMASTER WAS MR. GULLICK. THE FIRST SCHOOL WAS OPENED ON THE{EIGHTH OF JANUARY 1974.}WHEN THE FIRST SCHOOL WAS OPENED THE HEADMISTRESS WAS MRS. A. YOUNG, SHE WAS HEADMISTRESS FOR FIVE YEARS. THERE ARE NOW THREE CLASSROOMS, THREE TEACHERS AND SEVENTY ONE PUPILS(1985). THE AGE GROUP OF THE CHILDREN IS FOUR TO EIGHT YEARS. THE FIRST AND SECOND YEARS ARE IN ONE CLASS AND THE THIRD AND FOURTH YEARS ARE SPLIT UP INTO TWO CLASSES ACCORDING TO THE WAY THEY WORK. THE CHILDREN ATTENDING THE SCHOOL ARE TAKEN FROM SEVERAL SURROUNDING VILLAGES AND TRAVEL TO SCHOOL EITHER BY COACH OR THEIR OWN TRANSPORT.
